pkgmetadata.longdescription: =============================rinoh-typeface-texgyrepagella=============================This package provides the `TeX Gyre Pagella`_ typeface for use with rinohtype_.TeX Gyre Pagella is based on URW Palladio L and can be used as a replacementfor Palatino... _TeX Gyre Pagella: http://www.gust.org.pl/projects/e-foundry/tex-gyre/pagella.. _rinohtype: https://github.com/brechtm/rinohtype#readme
